text: Had a fun experience as the waitress served out food with perfection. As it was my birthday they helped to play the happy birthday song thru their sound system as well as singing it for me. Pizza Hut @ HarbourFront was the best experience ever for my 18th birthday!!! üî•üî•üî•üíØüíØüíØ

I had an amazing experience at Pizza Hut, thanks to Engku and the team! The service was exceptional, and everyone was so welcoming and attentive. The pizza was absolutely delicious, with the perfect balance of flavors and the freshest ingredients. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, making it the ideal spot for a meal with friends or family. A big thank you to Engku and the team for going above and beyond to make our visit memorable. Highly recommend this Pizza Hut location!

We attended the kids‚Äô pizza-making workshop yesterday, and it was such a delightful experience! Although there were some inconveniences during the registration process, everything went smoothly after getting in touch with Cherry, the manager at the Harbourfront location. Her professionalism, communication skills, and kindness were truly appreciated.

The workshop itself was excellent! It was clear that all the staff put in a lot of effort and preparation to make the event special. My child had a wonderful time learning and creating their own pizza. Thank you for organizing such a fun and meaningful activity. We‚Äôve made some unforgettable memories at Pizza Hut!

Excellent customer service by May and Tim to help me out with vegetarian option.
The pizza was super delicious and order arrived quickly.
Enjoyed the friendly ambiance of the place and would visit again.
Thank you!
